fullDescription.intro:
Modifies a column by
adding a default time zone to cells which do not contain a time zone yet or changes an already existing time zone.
shifting the time zone by changing or adding the time zone of cells to a default time zone and shifting their times according to it.
removing the time zone of cells which do contain one.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be modified.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

tab.name: Action Selection
tab.option: Adds a default time zone to cells which do not contain a time zone yet or changes an already existing time zone.

Shifts the time zone by changing the time zone of cells which already have a time zone to a default time zone or adding a time zone to cells which do not have one yet and shifting their times according to it.
Removes the time zone of cells which do contain one.
A fixed time zone to be set of shifted.

ports.outPort: Output table with modified time zone.
